title: Kunstformen der Natur - Wikimedia Commons
cleaned_text: [edit](/w/index.php?title=Kunstformen_der_Natur&action=edit§ion=1)] The following images are plates, in order of their plate number, from German biologist and illustrator [Ernst Haeckel](/wiki/Ernst_Haeckel)'s [Kunstformen der Natur] (Artforms of Nature) (1904). For crops of individual items from a specific plate, click on the plate below. You can also go to [Category:Kunstformen der Natur - derivative](/wiki/Category:Kunstformen_der_Natur_-_derivative) for all individual crops. Detailed views of the volume are at [Biodiversity Heritage Library](https://www.biodiversitylibrary.org/item/182319#page/7/mode/1up) and individual plate images can be found [here](https://www.flickr.com/photos/biodivlibrary/albums/72157710027256011) - Cover - 1.
